tool.name: ClusteringPredict
tool.description: : Makes predictions from an input dataset and a given clustering model.

param.name: input_model_path
param.label: input PKL file
param.help: Path to the input model. Format: [input].pkl

param.name: input_dataset_path
param.label: input CSV file
param.help: Path to the dataset to predict. Format: [input].csv

param.name: outname_output_results_path
param.label: output CSV name
param.help: Path to the output results file Format: [output].csv

param.name: sele
param.label: Take tool settings:
param.help: Select where tool settings are to be read from

param.name: properties
param.label: Configuration file
param.help: File containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: jsonstr
param.label: JSON string
param.help: JSON string containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: predictions
param.label: predictions
param.help: List of dictionaries with all values you want to predict targets. It will be taken into account only in case **input_dataset_path** is not provided. Format: [{ 'var1': 1.0, 'var2': 2.0 }, { 'var1': 4.0, 'var2': 2.7 }] for datasets with headers and [[ 1.0, 2.0 ], [ 4.0, 2.7 ]] for datasets without headers. (Json)
